actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants for the construction of certain treatment works, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to make grants for the construction of publicly owned treatment works in the South Valley of Bernalillo County, New Mexico. Authorizes the Administrator to use $25 million of specified funds made available to EPA under the Departments of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 1994 to carry out such construction.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants for the construction of certain treatment works, and for other purposes.
